items.detail_description: tailored, dark blue jacket with a subtle texture, fine herringbone pattern. It features notch lapels, a two-button front closure, and a slim fit that contours closely to the body.

black classic, tailored design, notched lapel, which is the folded flap of cloth on the front that extends from the collar. The jacket is single-breasted with a single row of buttons down the front, and it appears to have two buttons, although only one buttonhole is visible. The fabric has a smooth texture with a matte finish and is solid black in color, providing a professional and sleek appearance, two flap pockets on either side at the waist level and what seems to be a welt pocket at chest height on the left side
charcoal grey, tailored jacket with a notched lapel design. It features a two-button front closure and a welt pocket on the left chest, which contains a white pocket square with a straight fold.
